full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,MA GCIG MKHA' 'GRO'I SNYAN BRGYUD KYI LAM ZAB RGYUN GYI RNAL 'BYOR 'KHYER BDE BKOD PA BZHUGS SO, ,
